item.title: Watches By SJX
item.description:
Watches By SJX

Based in the Isle of Man, English watchmaker Roger W. Smith is best known as the protege of the late George Daniels, inventor of the Co-Axial escapement now used by Omega. Up till now, Roger W. Smith's offering of serially produced timepieces comprised of just a single model, the Series 2.
